backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with access control, user profiles, categories, products, promo codes, customers, and orders using core Map collections and comparison modules.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs for authentication-aware account UI and profile flows.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of many frontend files covering routing, UI components, hooks, pages, and state management.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark theming and component colors.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the full application router with storefront and admin routes, mixing eager and lazy-loaded pages wrapped in layout and theme providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminShell: Admin layout providing header, sidebar navigation, and logout handling wrapped in an admin access guard.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Guards admin pages by checking authentication and admin status, redirecting or showing an access-denied screen.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSpinner.t: Simple loading spinner component with centered animated indicator.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: SEO helper that updates the document title and meta description on mount.
frontend/src/components/site/StorefrontF: Renders the storefront footer with branding, navigation links, contact info, and a dynamic year plus referral link.
frontend/src/components/site/StorefrontH: Implements the storefront header with navigation, cart count, authentication handling, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/site/StorefrontL: Wraps pages with a shared header and footer layout structure.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Promo: Provides UI and logic for validating, applying, and removing promo codes during checkout.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/usePlaceOrd: Mutation hook that creates or fetches a customer and submits an order, invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuth.ts: Authentication-related hooks for checking admin status, fetching and saving the caller's user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCategories: Category CRUD hooks using react-query with cache invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrders.ts: Order retrieval and update hooks, including status changes, unseen counts, and customer lookup.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useProducts.t: Product CRUD and retrieval hooks, including filtering by category and updating react-query caches.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePromoCodes: React Query hooks for CRUD operations and validation of promo codes using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom light and dark theme variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Admin page for listing, creating, editing, and deleting product categories with dialogs and forms.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCustomersP: Admin page that derives customers from orders and displays their info and order histories using accordions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays admin dashboard stats for orders, revenue, products, and categories using fetched data, with quick navigation actions.
Handles admin login via Internet Identity, checks admin privileges, and redirects or shows login/logout options.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Shows a filterable orders table with status updates, marking as seen, and CSV export.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Provides product listing with dialogs for creating, editing, and deleting products.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPromoCodes: Manages promo codes with creation, editing, deletion, and a form for discount settings.
frontend/src/pages/storefront/AccountPag: Displays and edits user profile data, with login handling via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/storefront/CartPage.t: Renders the shopping cart with item quantity controls, promo code support, and price calculations, with an empty-cart fallback. Allows updating and removing items before checkout.
frontend/src/pages/storefront/CheckoutPa: Handles order checkout with user details, validation, promo codes, and order submission. Redirects to confirmation page after placing the order.
frontend/src/pages/storefront/ContactPag: Displays contact information, business hours, and an about section for Fal Sarovar. Provides phone, email, and location details.
frontend/src/pages/storefront/HomePage.t: Landing page showcasing hero content, best sellers, and health-focused messaging. Fetches products and highlights top items.
frontend/src/pages/storefront/MenuPage.t: Shows product catalog with category filters, product details modal, and add‑to‑cart functionality. Loads categories and products from API.
frontend/src/pages/storefront/OrderConfi: Displays order confirmation details using the order ID and provides navigation options back to home or the menu.
frontend/src/state/cartStore.ts: Defines a persisted Zustand store for cart items with add, remove, update, clear, and total calculation logic.
frontend/src/state/useCart.ts: Provides a convenience hook that exposes cart store state and actions.
frontend/src/utils/exportOrders.ts: Generates a CSV file from order and product data and triggers a client-side download.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current build state, high-level requirements, architecture notes, and implemented features.
